In England, in the seven days to 07 February, there were 422,987 new confirmed cases (748.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 January, there were 570,048 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 26% (147,061 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 February is 15,584,863 (27,559.4 cases per 100,000 population).
